titles: Tvvo bookes of ayres The first contayning diuine and morall songs: the second, light conceites of louers. To be sung to the lute and viols, in two, three, and foure parts: or by one voyce to an instrument. Composed by Thomas Campian.
author: Campion, Thomas, 1567-1620.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Snodham, for Mathew Lownes, and I. Browne Cum priuilegio,
notes: A reissue, with cancel general title page, of "The first [second] booke of ayres", STC 4546.5.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
